metadata.name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Process Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious process patterns found in logs when CrackMapExec is used

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tasklist /fi ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('imagename eq lsass.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k '))) AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('do rundll32.exe c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\comsvcs.dll, minidump')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' full')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%%b')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tasklist /v /fo csv')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr /i "lsass"'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious process patterns found in logs when CrackMapExec is used
